supporting_quotes: served as the sixth President of Indonesia from 2004 to 2014
He was sworn into office on 20 October 2004, together with Jusuf Kalla as Vice President
He ran for re-election in 2009 with Boediono as his running mate
he was sworn in for a second term on 20 October
served as the president of the Assembly and chair of the Council of the Global Green Growth Institute
He founded the Democratic Party of Indonesia and served as its 4th chairman from 2014 until 2020
served as the 8th and 10th Coordinating Minister for Political and Security Affairs from 2000 until 2001 and again from 2001 until 2004
